name: Don Marsh
text:
I was referred to Blue Reef Watersports by a close friend who had visited Golf Shores. Honestly had not considered Golf Shores for a vacation destination but was very nervous to try para sailing.

We set up a fly time before leaving for vacation. The second day of vacation we showed up at Blue Reef's location. Knowing that vacation destinations that involve the beach can sometimes run on "island time" we showed up early. The staff had our confirmation and were ready for us when we arrived. Perfect!

Once on the boat, the captain made feel safe and relaxed. With music playing on the boat we (my wife and I)were strapped in and off to see the beach from an aerial view. It was a blast and I have the picture they toke to prove it.

We have been back once since and met up with the staff at Blue Reef once again. This time we rented jet skis and played in the water. We had a great time!

Thanks again,

See you next time.

name: Travis Keedy
text: Friendly, fun staff!  I hatched a plan to propose up in the air while para-sailing and Blue Reef was incredibly accommodating and helpful.  We had a blast!  We are semi-local and will be returning to this outfit for more water-fun.

name: Tammy Murphy
text: Parasailing was awesome!!! We love the beaches in “Sweet Home Alabama!  My boyfriend and I went out with Blue Reef Watersports and we had a blast! The crew was great and kept us laughing the whole time! They had a good picture deal and we were very glad to have them :) I’m definitely  a fan for life and will be back soon!

name: Christian Neal
text: Before the main Jet Ski guide passed away and this place closed down, this place was the absolute best. I sure wish they would open back up.

name: Woodrow Beavers
text:
** Beware **
While most of the staff at Blue Reef Watersports are nice enough, the concept of customer service is completely foreign.  We paid for he photo package, but when our children returned from their parasailing, the staff said that the camera card had been misplaced...check back in an hour.  OK, we thought, no big deal.

We checked back in an hour, still no card, "we'll bring your card to you when we close up shop for the night."

No such luck.  They neither brought the card by nor called me to let me know what was going on.

The next morning, after finally reaching a manager, and explaining that we were departing that day, they agreed to take our kids back up during the lunch-hour just long enough to snap some pictures.

Another call back from the manager, however, and their story had changed again...the only slot open for the re-fly was 4:30pm.  As we were leaving after lunch, we simply couldn't accept that.

Our twins enjoyed the ride well enough, but the company's response to their mistake is simply inexcusable.

I encourage everyone to take their business elsewhere.

name: Judy Davis
text: Fantastic Experience It was awesome fantastic experience in itself. Ride was smooth and great fun. It was my first experience parasailing, and to tell you the truth, I’m a little afraid of heights.  Well, the crew was re-assuring and really helped me…I think my fear of heights might even be gone now. I would love to do it again sometime :) Blue Reef Watersports is first class…

name: Daine Smith
text: Low and short parasail flights. Don't waste your money here. 5 to 7 min flights. Go to another supplier.

name: Kim Garaux
text: I would not recommend this place, very unprofessional, we had appt at 10 am, they called and running 1 hr behind, so we got there at 11 and we were told it was now 12pm for departure time for parasailing,  we asked if there would be any other delays and we were told no unless there was unforseen wind or if the boat blew up and sank, who says this things? Anyway, we then got a call saying the boat was broke and did we want to reschedule? Hell no I don't want to, I just want to cancel. I didn't even want to give a 1 star, but there was no 0 star rating.

name: Don Marsh
text:
I was referred to Blue Reef Watersports by a close friend who had visited Golf Shores. Honestly had not considered Golf Shores for a vacation destination but was very nervous to try para sailing.

We set up a fly time before leaving for vacation. The second day of vacation we showed up at Blue Reef's location. text: Low and short parasail flights. Don't waste your money here. 5 to 7 min flights. Go to another supplier.

text: I would not recommend this place, very unprofessional, we had appt at 10 am, they called and running 1 hr behind, so we got there at 11 and we were told it was now 12pm for departure time for parasailing,  we asked if there would be any other delays and we were told no unless there was unforseen wind or if the boat blew up and sank, who says this things? Anyway, we then got a call saying the boat was broke and did we want to reschedule? Hell no I don't want to, I just want to cancel. I didn't even want to give a 1 star, but there was no 0 star rating.

name: Todd Pennycuff
text: This place was awesome, one of my girls was scared and crying and the staff got her right in it and up and as soon as she hit the air she went to all smiles. Great experience and great staff.

name: Phillip Whitlock
text: What an awesome experience. The crew was great the view is great, we really enjoyed ourselves on our trip today. The only issue was we went first and they wouldn’t quite ready for photos so we didn’t get photos of us taking off or of us on the boat. But it still was a five-star experience thank you guys

name: Cheryl Nicols
text: Had a great time . The crew (Justin and River ) were wonderful and very knowledgeable. They made us feel very safe and comfortable. We saw a shark and a sea turtle 🐢 while we were up ! It was a great adventure and would definitely recommend.

name: Kevin Taylor
text: Karen was the best phone saleswoman ever!! Great info and great at just being fun! The Alabama grad captain was super nice, ROLL TIDE ! His deck hand for the day was super funny and helpful. Great experience absolutely a must do!! Will be back !!

name: Dewey Vickroy
text: Captain and crew were great.  Great experience, we had a blast!  Would highly recommend OB Parasail!

name: Brandon King
text: The guys at orange beach parasail did an awesome job! It was a wonderful trip, we felt safe at all times, and had an amazing flight! They were also nice enough to give us some great fishing information. The captain Chip and his crew knew exactly what they were doing to make this a great experience for my group. We will be returning the next time we are here in Orange Beach!

name: Meredith Stinson
text: Had a great time.  Captain and deckhand were very fun to go out with and they did a real nice professional job.  Will go back next time we visit.

name: Elizabeth Taylor
text: Justin and Josh were the best!!  Had an amazing time and saw a hammerhead shark!!!!  Highly recommend 👏🏻

name: Gabby Davis
text: Parasailing was the best, I had the best time ever thanks to Eric and Drew!!! 10/10

name: Margaret Ahart
text: This was on my husband's bucket list. It was a wonderful experience. The personal was fabulous. Answered all our questions. The owner was very nice. My three sons went and my grandsons. They loved it. I would do it again with the same guys. They made you feel comfortable and they just made it fun. You all rocked.😎🌞

name: David Turner
text: Awesome experience, the captain and his helper was great..

name: Joshua Kesling
text: My son and I LOVED this!!! I have been before but this crew was EXCEPTIONAL!! There is truly no substitute for the one to one service and care offered by smaller companies- six stars... no- SEVEN!!! WE WILL BE BACK!!!

name: Misty Montgomery
text: Because of OBP, we had a fantastic parasailing experience. Was my first time and I was a little scared. First thing Captain Chip said was..."Safety first on my boat" -- music to my ears. He went over instructions thoroughly. Shay(amazing deckhand) harnessed us in and got us in 'take off' position and up we went. Was a gentle lift, no jerks or jars the entire time. Smooth sailing. He lowered us down in the water (just enough to dip feet and legs) and put us back up in the air -- So. Much. Fun!  I did this with my teenage son -- Wouldn't take anything for the memory♡  A great time! And I can't leave Karen out, she is who you will talk to when you schedule -- she is amazing at answering all questions and is very friendly. Great crew! Great time!

name: Kim King
text: Awesome free this morning! Chip and crew thank you!

name: Stan Holmes
text: First, Karen was phenomenal at scheduling. We added some folks at the last second and she was very helpful. We had 6 flyers and 3 riders on the boat. Price and Cody were super. My grandson had a cast on his leg and we were really worried about how that would work. Everyone was great and my grandson had the time of his life.

name: Tate Thomas
text: Tim and Josh were the best! Request them if you ever go!!!!!

name: Kristy Spradley
text:
We did this as a family adventure and this was my first time as I’m scared of everything.
We enjoyed everything about our experience from beginning to end. The entire crew was super friendly & down to earth. The view was beautiful, we even got to see a sea turtle up close. Can’t wait to get home and upload our photos. You can’t go wrong with these guys!! Can’t say enough great things about this experience.

name: kathy nash
text: First time I had ever parasailed and it was GREAT! Staff was terrific!!! Definitely worth it, will do again.

name: dr johnson3253
text: Went today and the Captain chip I believe and shay was a great duo on the boat! Easy registration as well!

name: Kayla Uhles
text: This was my first time parasailing and it was a great experience! All of the staff members were very nice and accommodating. We had very little wind during our trip and the boat staff did a great job of still giving us a great ride. I would definitely go back!

name: Tara Adams
text: These people here was so nice. My daughter broke her flip flops, when she got out of the vehicle. The lady went to her own car and got a pair that she could use. We all had a blast. This is the only place, if we ever went again, that we would go to.

name: Britten Prentler
text: Amazing experience. Kevin was our captain and Shay was the helper. They made you feel like friends instead of just another tourist. Highly recommend orange beach parasailing.

name: Katie Sonnek
text: The crew was amazing and very helpful! The captain had us laughing the whole time. We were first timers and they made us very comfortable, we will definitely fly with them again!!!

name: Jean Longshore
text: Awesome!!!  Lady on phone put me at ease about experience .   Not scary, great views, very smooth ride.  Staff was experienced and polite and went over everything we needed to know.  Look forward to another flight.

name: T Anthony
text: Really enjoyed this whole experience! Staff was awesome! Scenery was beautiful!

name: tammy gourley
text: It was great! The guys were funny..very knowledgeable and made the experience awesome! We even lucked up and saw dophins twice! Would recommend this place and would definitely do it again!

name: Micha H
text: My 9 year old daughter and I went parasailing with this company yesterday. It was absolutely amazing. The entire experience was fun, relaxing and safe. This will be a highlight for your trip. It was for us!

name: Shane Stover
text: Crew was real good.  Boat was on time.  The lady in front of me asked for a price match and the guy at the dock said, "well that boat doesn't even run".  Not sure if she got the price match or not.  I GoPro'ed my whole ride...Total of 5:12 seconds...saw on other websites they offered 10-11 minute rides, looked back on this site and it didn't say how long the rides were, should have checked that closer.  Experience was a good one, but would like to have had a longer ride...would probably go with a company with a longer ride next time...5:12 is pretty short for $118 tandem ride.

name: Kerry Begnaud
text: Great Family fun!!!! The pictures were perfect!! So glad we choose this location!!

name: ASHLEY
text: My kids had so much fun and we would go again

name: Ashli Hall
text: My husband and I went parasailing this past week for our very first time! We can not say enough good things about this place, everything from the booking process with Jessica to the captain and deckhand! Josh was our captain and Brandon was the deckhand. They were both very good about explaining what we needed to do to be safe and have fun all at the same time! We seen everything from a sting ray, to a sea turtle, to dolphins and even some jellyfish! We would recommend these guys to any and everyone! Two thumbs up from us guys!

name: Melissa Good
text: This was, by far, the best parasailing experience I've had! The guys were great--extremely professional and really fun! We purchased the photo package for $35 and walked away with an SD card with about 120 pictures on it! We can't wait until next year's beach trip to parasail with them again!

name: roxannespence9
text: Orange Beach Parasailing was great! They were very nice on the phone and in person! The captain and crew were very aware of who was to be on the boat and were very clear about everyone's safety. This was my first time and I would definitely go back to them again!

name: Sherm 35
text:
I kind of got sea sick it was choppy.. and we were in the air like 5 min
I paid 35 for 2 kids just to ride because they were scared

name: Olivia Counts
text:
We were late. They sweet woman on the other end of the phone said it was ok, this is vacation and time to relax not to be upset about being late!!
She was so understanding and compassionate that I calmed down right away!!

I am terrified of heights. I was nervous to try parasailing, but Harold and Maui were friendly and professional.
They knew what they were doing and it showed.

They took us way out in the ocean and we went up 3 at a time. I screamed like a banshee but after we got up there it was so quiet and peaceful. The scenery was devine and the company was nice.

Thank you to all the people at OB Parasail. You put us at ease and made our vacation a success!!

name: Jennifer Lackey
text: Howard and Maui were great! We had a wonderful time!

name: Jamie Russell
text: We had a great experience!!!! The staff was so friendly and fun! Well worth the money!!!!

name: Rhonda Wheeler
text: Loads of fun, felt very safe and the crew was great.  We will parasail with them again!

name: Will Flores
text: The captain that took us out yesterday at 11 needs a course in customer service.  He was very rude.  Also, they tell you when you’re paying that you’ll be up for 10 minutes, but its only half that time.

name: Brooke Weaver
text: Slade and Kason were great! We had several weather delays, but it was worth it. They were really good with my kids who were first timers. Highly recommend!

name: Richelle Blackburn
text: Slade and Trystan were wonderful!  Made these old ladies feel comfortable and safe!  We had a wonderful time!

name: Becky Young
text: Spade and Tristan did an AMAZING job!!  Our big group had a BLAST!!  Thank you!!

name: Jordan Gorrell
text: Captain Slade and Trystan were amazing! Must check this off your bucket list!

name: mengy !
text: Slade and Tryston were really fun! I had a great time!!

name: Andrew Rowland
text: Saying the trip and staff were amazing would be an understatement!!!

name: mosterqman
text: Captain Slade and River were amazing and entertaining the whole time. It made me lose all nervousness and enjoy the ride.

name: Mellenie Pearson
text: Slade and Tristian had us laughing the whole time. Great experience. Definitely recommend!

name: John Smith
text: Caption slade and Tristan are a fun group to be with when doing something out of your comfort zone! Had a blast.

name: Jordan Lunsford
text: We had Slade & Tristan & they were great!! We had such a good time! Definitely recommend.

name: Zoe Willis
text: BRANDON AND SHAY WERE AMAZING! They were so sweet! They should win the competition!!!

name: Faith Cole
text: Loved this place, it was so fun & very exciting! They had us laughing the whole time & the picture package turned out perfect! The water was choppy and it was kinda scary at first but I’m the air it was so peaceful! The workers and the captain of the boat settled us down by their humor and knowledge! If I could I would give it 10 stars!

name: Amber
text: Great experience! I took my coworker’s family for a fun day at the beach and had a blast! Captain Metro and his deckhand Geo made it so much fun with high energy and great pictures. They had us laughing the whole time! Highly recommend! Would give 6 stars if possible!

name: victoria masticola
text: Our flight was cancelled due to bad weather coming in, so we switched to Wednesday instead of Sunday. They did not change the information in the computer so we showed up and could not ride. Over the phone I asked if we would be able to use a coupon I had and they said yes. When we showed up we were told differently. They did not do well with fixing the errors. We also had to wait over an hour if we were going to go today but there were no openings. I would not recommend this to anyone. This is more of a headache than it's worth.

name: Kate Guthrie
text: Wonderful staff and accommodations!  Very friendly and fun.  My teens had a blast and the crew made it extra fun for them.  Definitely recommend to anyone in the area👍👍👍👍

name: Jolene Mathis
text: Great Experience!  Crew and staff were extremely professional.  My 70 year old mom and 4 year old son were able to parasail without any difficulties.  In fact, my 4 year old asked if he could do it again.

name: Stephanie Powell
text: Metro and Geo were both wonderful. They were awesome with the kids, and really fun and outgoing. My boys had a blast parasailing. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tommy Wallace
text: Let's hope you book Chute Em Up Parasail Fort Morgan for the best parasailing experience ever. My wife and I rode as observers of my daughter and her friend. That gave us the opportunity to see Gio and Metro in action. This crew kept us in stitches while conducting the trip professionally and safely. The next time we come to the Gulf this adventure will certainly be on our list again. Thanks to the crew and staff!

name: Westphal Family
text: We went there with our two children and the whole process was simple and our captain metro and deckhand geo were simply the nicest most enjoyable guys you could ask for.  They were always keeping us smiling and always ensuring we were having the best time!

name: Neal Kirby
text: Gio and Metro were awesome, great personalities and made parasailing and dolphin cruise enjoyable. Took great pics for great memories. Would highly recommend!

name: Sheila Kessler
text: The guys working the boat were sassy and fun. If you’re a nervous nelly, they will capitalize on it and not necessarily coddle you, so bring your sense of humor. It’s all good fun and they were attentive to our safety by making sure we were all strapped in correctly and always reminding “3-points of contact with the boat at all times.” While you will be teased “s’up Shark Bait?”, it’s an overall fun experience. The guys went so far as to take pics on their iPhone and texted them the next day, saving me $$ on the photo package, which did look nice but beyond my budget for the activity. I would recommend Gio and his captain (sorry, Capt, I couldn’t hear your name but you have mad driving skills). Expect a little good natured ribbing, a fun sail, and enjoy the view.

name: Payton Sutcliffe
text: BEST PARASAILING TRIP EVER!!! Gio and Metro are the Best! They're really nice and they make the trip more fun.

name: Joe Nounou
text: Great guys, made everything a lot of fun. Highly recommend them :)

name: Alexis Plum
text: Had a slot for 2pm and we showed up 30 minutes prior to our appointment slot and was told that the wait would be expected up to 1-2 hours. Organization was not put together well and the lady working at the desk was not nice. Wish they would’ve texted us to tell that they were behind schedule since they did have our number. There was about 3 other families left out to wait aswell behind schedule.

name: Tom Daniel
text: Great fun experience!!! Gio & Metro did a great job and were great to the kids!!

name: Jonathan Tindal
text: My kids had nothing but good things to say about the guys on the boat. They had a blast!

name: Alex bono
text: Boat was an hour late, they offered a free banana boat ride which you already would have got with the parasaling, so in my mind they really didnt offer anything. I asked for a discount and the woman working said she was going to call the manager and just sat there and looked like she just texted them. Didnt show any sort of urgency to make things right with us. Would not go back! Please dont make the same mistake i did by booking here.

name: Jacey Barnes
text: my first time parasailing was this past week and it was a very bad experience for me.. they dipped us in a patch of jellyfish and the guys who took us on the boat popped my bikini bottom putting on my harness and told the girl i was with that he wasn't trying to play with her butt.. will never go back.. and on top of that its supposed to be a 10 minute thing and we were only up there for about 5 minutes or less....

name: Hi I’m Demonetized
text: Great and fun

name: Olivia Cain
text: So fun!!!

name: Brian Thompson
text: good

name: Ben Mikeworth
text: Just a class act all the way around.  From check in to boat rides and especially the parasailing. Highly recommend!

name: R1OT MooNLiGhT
text: A great experience with even better service!  Thanks to the Captain and crew! Love the picture package too!

name: Eric Patterson
text:
The kids have wanted to parasail for a long time, and this trip we did it. Ike's was awesome. They worked us in very quickly and took great care of us. My wife is very nervous around water, and they made her feel comfortable and safe. Jason and Parker were absolute professionals on the boat. They knew exactly what they were doing and were very alert, attentive, and FUN! The music they played was GREAT. I've been listening to Eminence Front by The Who ever since that trip!

If you're looking for a unique and fun experience this is the place.

name: Donna Cook
text: These guys and gals are top notch.  Easter weekend and the water was ice cold, but we would do it again.  Check in girl was nice and personable.  Lots of smiles.  Guy getting us on the banana boat, same.  Two guys on the boat were lots of fun. Jason and Charles, I think, but not sure. Thanks to all for making this a great experience

name: Susan Gonzales
text: Very professional.  From Lady at office( I had lots of questions), to waiting for banana boat( man nice), ride to boat.  Captain Jason and first mate very professional.  Great time. Take off smooth and landing. Beautiful I would use Ikes again. Will return.  Great time.

name: Brett Leatherman
text:
Booked with Ike’s for a 12:30p flight for a family of 6. We arrived and were told they had boat issues and if we wanted to sail, would need to travel to their Gulf Shores location for an evening flight (6p). We booked there, after spending our morning waiting to go on a noon flight, and received a call at 2:30p asking us to switch to a 5p flight at the Gulf Shores location. Called back to confirm, and was told the captain was canceling the remaining afternoon flights.

We wasted an entire day of our vacation trying to parasail with this company. We were able to call around and grab a flight with another company - who fit us into a 6p slot (severe clear weather). Will not use this company again - despite the original recommendation - and cannot recommend them to any family or group looking to enjoy your beach vacation.

name: Joy Bauer
text: Wow! What an EXCELLENT experience Ike's has it ALL!  From the moment we inquired to the end of our parasailing adventure their customer service was top notch!!  We met some AMAZING people from the lady who greeted us at the stand to the jet ski driver Sawyer and Cam.  Our boat crew Jason and Jacob were super friendly, entertaining and helpful!  They made you feel comfortable the moment you stepped onto their boat!  I would highly recommend Ike's for your parasailing adventure!  You even get to ride the banana boat to get out to the boat!!!!

name: heidi heusinkveld
text:
I cannot express enough, how amazing Ike’s is!! Jason and Sawyer made our dreams come true! The weather did not cooperate the week that we were in Alabama, but they sure worked extremely hard, for our experience. Hands down, the best! Very knowledgeable and lots of fun! Highly recommend this company, five stars!!  Thank you from the bottom of my heart, for all of your effort in getting us in the air!
Heidi Shanks and boys

name: coloradolife 18
text: Very first activity we did while on vacation.  Had to so much fun I brought my little cousin to fly just 2 days later. Thanks Jason and Parker

name: Lisa Rohr
text: We had an amazing time parasailing with Ike's Parasail.  We had a couple glitches that was no fault of theirs and they made it work so that we wouldn't miss out on the fun.  There were so many jelly fish in the water where we were supposed to get the banana boat they called in advance and said we could still go if we wouldn't mind coming to the marina in Orange Beach to catch the boat.  No problem!  Everyone at the check in point was very friendly and very helpful.  The water was rough that day but it was just a couple days before Hurricane Sally.  Our captain did his best to make it as smooth as possible for us.  Our crewman was amazing.  He handled the rough water very well and managed to get us our life jackets, our harnesses, help us get ready to fly and also took a ton of pictures!  He deserved a large tip for sure!  We were shocked at all he was doing!  We had 8 of us from 9 years old to 67 and we all loved it.  They were very knowledgeable and we felt comfortable with them the entire time.  We all want to do it again someday!  Hopefully the weather and the water will cooperate next time and we will get the banana boat ride too.  Ike's did everything they could possibly do so that we could enjoy our adventure!

name: Emily Bauer
text: We had so much fun parasailing! The crew was all very nice, helpful and funny.  I would highly recommend everyone going parasailing with Ike’s.

name: Kimberly Dowdy
text: My daughter and I had a fantastic time parasailing. She is scared of heights, but they made the experience phenomenal. They talked us through every step. Jason and Parker were absolutely the best. My youngest daughter and husband loved the boat ride. After, we returned to the boat my daughter said she would definitely parasail again as long as it was with them. Anyone thinking about parasailing, I would recommend them above anyone else, hands down. Great job, guys. We loved it!!!

name: Keeler Family
text: Ike's Parasail was fabulous...from the friendly girls at the kiosk to the guy getting us fitted for lifejackets....everyone was friendly, helpful and explained how things would work. The crew on the boat were especially great at taking care of things, explaining and making it fun!

name: Karen Sweeney
text: Highly recommend this place! Today my two young kids, myself, and my mother went parasailing with this company. The two men who worked on our boat were so fun, and made us all feel at ease. We had a wonderful time, and would recommend this place to everyone of all ages!

name: Jill Schilling
text: We just left the banana boat ride. We paid for 30 minutes of ride time, but only received 12 minutes. We paid almost 90 bucks for a 12 minute ride? What the HELL. The boat that took my family out rushed them back and went out to pick up parasailing. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!

name: Mistie Merritt
text: Most Amazing Part of Our Trip was Parasailing🪂with Captain Jason and Crew 🙌🙌 They were so fun and personable. Oh and don't forget Captain Weiner, that ride to the boat was Epic 😉😆 This is our new Vacay Spot, We will be back. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Amy Guiter
text: First mate Charles and  Captain Jason were FANTASTIC and our kids will always remember the experience!  We felt very safe with them!!

resp.text: I am glad ya'll had a great time.Come back and see us again. Thanks Ike

name: cuddy link
text: Jason the captain was great and his deck hand Jacob was key to all the fun great time highly recommend!

name: Carol Lawson
text: We had a great time!, Everyone on the team today was kind, knowledgeable, fun to interact with and very professional! We had as much fun getting to the boat as we did flying! Mike and Justin were great on the boat, I didn’t feel nervous at all!  Can’t wait to come back next season and do it again!!

name: Mark Black
text: Picking Ike's Parasail off Google was a win. Took my 74 yr old dad for his birthday and he loved it. The entire crew from check in to the water was fantastic and on their A game. They were friendly, safe, and knew exactly what they were doing for a smooth experience from start to finish. Would highly recommend and will go with this company again next time.

name: Rodney Teague
text: Loved it! Family of seven from nine to seventy-four years old-- all had a spectacular time. Everyone from the booth attendant to beach side to captain & deckhand took great care of us and were great at their jobs. We felt safe and free to just enjoy the ride. Top notch!

name: Marvin Carlton
text: Great group of people... the weather wasn't cooperating well but they got us scheduled and it was great!!! The crew at the gulf state park boat was very nice and you can tell they know what they are doing cause they do it well... l will definitely take the family flying above the gulf again when I come back!

name: Jeannie Smalygo
text: Online reservation was fast and easy. Everyone was awesome, from the check-in crew on the beach that got us fitted for life jackets, to the crew on the boat. We had a blast! Note: you can’t take phones or cameras on the boat, so if you want photos - spring for the ones they take (the price was reasonable and you get the SD card). Go and have fun!

name: Kristen Neary
text: Everyone communicated what would be happening next very well. We always knew what we were doing. The banana-boat ride out to the boat was an added bonus! Charles was an amazing photographer and was very professional. He kept our daughter calm when she was scared. Mike did a great job driving the boat and made the "flight" fun and peaceful. I definitely recommend this place and I hope everyone experiences Charles and Mike on their trip. The guy who put us on and off the banana boat was great too, but I didnt catch his name.

name: Debbie Trojahn
text: We rode the banana boat in Gulf Shores. So fun!! The staff was very helpful and friendly. Charlie gave us directions and fitted us with vests. Josh pulled us with the jet ski, and gave us a mildly wild ride. We laughed and laughed. Thanks for a good time!

name: Brandy Enlow
text: Mike and Sawyer were amazing. Our little family had such a great time. I’ve never been parasailing before and they made sure we knew what to expect and were so nice and friendly. I highly recommend Ike’s! If we ever come back this will be exactly who we book with.

name: John Burnette
text: Absolutely perfect!  All of the crew working Ike's at Gulf State Park Pavillion site were great.  I took my 11 year old and he had a blast.  We bought the picture package and pictures turned out very good.  Great people, great service, great value, and a great time.

name: Beth Sparks
text: We entrusted our two 14 year old girls in the hands of Ike’s Parasail and were not let down! We only spoke with the young lady in the booth at the Gulf pavilion and the man who helped them with life jackets and onto the banana boat, but they were both very nice and did a great job explaining the process and just being friendly and interactive. My only complaint (and reason I didn’t give 5 stars) was that the pictures that I purchased in advance for $40 were not of good quality. Yes they took about 40 pictures, but only a couple of them were print/share worthy. The rest are either real blurry or have the rope in front of one of the girl’s faces. Otherwise, the trip was an incredible experience that these girls will never forget.

name: Jamie Lane
text: This was our first time to parasail, my 9 year old and me. The experience was amazing! The guys, Jason and Josh, were wonderful! They explained everything to us clearly! I read review after review after review and decided to go with Ike’s. We will go with them again! We had a great time and plan to make this our beach tradition!

name: Mitzi Norris
text: The actual sailing was alright. But... The boat driver "Flew" over very rough waves, too fast, "Blaring rock music so loud we couldn't hear ourselves talk, while he "sang"! Won't use them again.

name: Topitina Topitina
text: This team is really good, they do not risk their customers! It was a very fun adventure, since you start by going on a banana boat to the little but comfy ship and from there off you go into parasailing! My daughter and her friend really liked the whole experience. My only suggestion would be to allow customers to take their own pictures. Anyway, Thank you guys!

name: Pearl Green
text: Jason and Sawyer were our boat guides.  Best experience ever! Smooth transition on and off the boat.  Took my 11 yr old granddaughter for her first parasail experience. She loved it! on future trips I will definitely use Ike's again. very fun and professional.  we even got same day reservations! z you will get wet, so be prepared! Highly recommend!

name: Lailah Utnage
text: I took my daughter for her birthday and it was everything she had hoped for. The crew on board the boat was fun and entertaining, and not to mention safe. This is a professional operation that I will be using again. Thank you.

name: Kathleen Edwards
text: Stayed at the Resort 4 days, Parasailing was on my bucket list. All I can say is Katelyn Wood was so amazing and friendly she made the signing up great then Charlie, Sawyer and Jason made us all so comfortable and laughing. A Great time was had by all, Highly Recommend

name: Cheri Hogrefe
text: It's not cheap for a family of five, but it was SO much fun. We filled out all the forms online to expedite the process, and I highly suggest doing that. The banana boat ride out to the big boat was hilariously adventurous. And the parasailing was awesome. Gorgeous views, and felt completely safe. Captain Jason and first hate Sawyer were very professional, but made sure we had a great time!

name: Amy Wilson
text: My 12 year old daughter and I went parasailing for the first time with Ike’s. It was a wonderful experience from start to finish! The staff at the beach as well as the captain and crew on the boat were awesome! My daughter and I both had a blast!

name: Lisa White
text: Safe, tranquil, beautiful, very smooth take off and landing back on the boat. Not scary at all!

name: Jennifer Rose
text: Jason(Captain) & Swayer(First Mate) were amazing! They explained everything very well. I was very nervous about going up! They were kind and very patient while I convinced myself again to just do it! I highly recommend this group and looking forward to our next trip!

name: Caitlyn Matherne
text: We had the most amazing time. My nephew had been asking to parasail since he was little and we finally said yes for him to go. The crew on board were so kind and efficent. The ride was smooth and something we will always remember. Would definitely go again, especially with Ike's!

name: Brenda Box
text: Jason and Sawyer were our guides. They were very professional and made our first time experience great. They were very knowledgeable which is what I needed since I am afraid of heights. I highly recommend this it is definitely one I enjoyed and will do it again.

name: J K
text: Went parasailing with Jason and Taco. Taco worked very hard and took some great pictures and Jason made sure everyone enjoyed themselves. Would absolutely recommend this experience and appreciate Taco and Jason making sure we were safe.

name: Jess J
text:
I don’t have enough good things to say about this group. The staff is phenomenal. I can’t remember everyone’s names, but thank you.
Charles, Sawyer, Chase, and the pretty lady at the kiosk killed it. Highly, HIGHLY recommend.

name: Ashley Tharp
text: These guys are super friendly, knowledgeable and fun! We flew at the Flori-Bama spot, and highly recommend them. They made my husband and daughters' first flights easy and memorable. Highly recommend!

name: Allison Warren
text: Jason and Sawyer were amazing!  Best parasailing we have done. The playlist on the boat was fantastic!  Very professional and we felt very safe. The banana boat ride to the boat was fun too. We also rented paddle boards from Ike’s and that was fun too. Best service!!

name: Adam Routon
text: My daughter and I had a great time parasailing with these guys. Jason and Josh did an awesome job with us out there! I highly recommend these guys if your in Gulf Shores.

name: Tina Mansker
text: These guys are amazing, we will definitely go again and will only use Ike’s in Gulf Shores. Captain Jason, Sawyer and Charles you guys are amazing thank you sooooo much!!!!!

name: Patricia Strand
text: Had a blast!  The two J's (I can't remember their names, just that they started with the letter j.) were funny and efficient with getting everyone off and Parasailing.

name: Bark Bark
text: I believe his name was Nick, one of the employees on the beach who fitted my wife and I our flotation vests was very friendly and seemed like he really wanted us to have a good time. The crew on the boat ensured our safety and was patient when I kept slipping down from the harness seat and reeled me in two times to try to fix the issue. The 3rd time was a charm. What I did not like about my overall experience is there was no safety brief or instructions on what to do before getting on boat. Also, I felt it creepy having to record a video of myself reading a waiver form promising not to sue and send it in. The actual flight was a pleasant experience. I also thought it was a little pricey and nervy to ask to pay gratuity up front.After paying taxes and gratuity, it was expensive. was it worth it? Yes, but at the price I paid, I would not do it again.

name: Shawn Schmitt
text: This was our first time parasailing and we loved every minute!! Jason and Sawyer were absolutely terrific!! We have a special needs daughter and they were fantastic with helping her in and out of the boat as well as interacting with her on her level. They made us and our daughter feel comfortable and confident in their abilities. We had a fabulous time and will definitely ask for this crew again next time we are in town. We would highly recommend Ike's Parasailing.

name: Devin Pierce
text: Jason and Charles are great! They made the entire experience fun, Friendly, and memorable! Had an awesome time.

name: kimberly soper
text: We had an an awesome experience. The staff were amazing! I highly recommend them and would do it again.😄

name: Britney Brunette
text: Little upset that it is now a "requirement" for an observer to be on the boat due to under 16. (Ages 13 and 15, 16 in 2 months) the kicker is having to pay the observer fee when it's mandatory. However, the boat crew was very nice, even the lady at the kiosk was nice. The rule is dumb.

name: Camae Smith
text: Lyndsey, Jason, and Sawyer were all incredible representations of your company. We had a blast, and will definitely recommend to friends and family!!

name: Chris Melton
text: It was a great experience I highly recommend doing this. Sawyer and the boat driver (sorry I can't remember the name), were great and made everyone on the boat feel comfortable.

name: Doug Ernst
text:
We booked Ike’s parasailing online for our trip to Gulf Shores. My boys (6 & 8) had never been, but they wanted to try it.
The booking experience was simple and easy. On the day of our flight/sailing, we were able to park at Ike’s (great, as parking at the beach can be tough), then walked over and were treated and taken to check-in. It was friendly and efficient!
In no time, we were life jackets, and being escorted out for a (fun! My boys loved it!) banana boat ride to the pick-up area to boat the Chute Yeah.
As we got on the boat, I couldn’t help but think it was the Outer Banks guys or the Rob Spicoli was our captain... but immediately I saw the way they handled the boat & gear and KNEW that these guys were true pros. Not only were Jason (Capt) and Josh (first mate, shark fighter/rescue diver/photographer) extremely Proficent, but they made it a complete BLAST!
Great tunes, fun atmosphere, PERFECT (safe, from take off to the dip, and landing) experience!
Book at Ike’s...ask for Jason & Josh... you won’t be sorry.

Oh, and the ride itself... well, my 6 y/o told me it was “the best week of his life” because of it, and my 8 y/o simply said “Dad it was epic”...

And you know what...they both were right. Come see for yourselves!!!

name: Katie Davis
text: Great experience! Beach crew were friendly and efficient. Boat crew (Jason and Jacob) were awesome. Highly recommended!

name: Sarah Jane Richards
text: The staff made this the best parasailing trip! The men were kind and helpful. You may need their assistance getting on the banana boat! I'm glad I found my one piece for this activity! 😎 We plan on doing this again during our next visit.

name: Bruce Shipwash
text: Great time, Great service. Went para sailing for the first time with my 12 year old son. We had a blast and would definitely do again.

name: Dawson
text: Ike's Parasailing is the best! Jason and Sawyer knew what they were doing and explained everything since it was our first time. Give Ike's Parasailing a try you won't be disappointed! I will go with Ike's again.

name: Pam Van
text: Other than me and my husband falling off the bannana boat🤣😂🤣😂 it was a great time. Our kids loved it!!!  RIP my ball cap!

name: A C
text: Took my 12 year old son out yesterday. The pretty blonde haired guy driving the boat was wonderful and so was the guy helping on the boat. The people we rode with were complete weirdos to put it nicely but we had a good time anyways. I have been parasailing many times in many different places and can tell the guys operating this boat know what they are doing so if this is your first time parasailing you are in good hands.

name: Jennifer Crumby
text: My daughter , and I did this today. We had such a great experience! Great group of people.

name: mindy davenport
text:
We went out this morning with Captain Mike and Josh. They were both amazing!
Highly recommend!

name: Jennifer Searcy
text: what a blast.  music on the boat was great.  everything we expected

name: Amy McCall
text: Absolutely terrible! 1:00Pm scheduled time and they tell us “sorry we can’t find you anywhere”. We have a paid receipt, charged over $600 and are told by the girl on the phone, “sorry, we can book you again but will have to charge us another $600”.  We are currently waiting to see if the manager actually calls us back.

name: Dustin Klinedinst
text: Road the Banana Boat float. Was a blast. Great guest service. Easy booking. Well worth it.

name: Jason Archer
text: This is probably the worst business I’ve ever encountered. Ashley is super incompetent and should barley be able to be out in society.

name: Victoria Russell
text: So fun! Everyone was very nice and helpful!!! Boat crew had the best vibes! Highly recommended!

name: treetop7232
text: We were first timers and they made it smooth! It was a great experience, wish we had done it sooner and will add it to the future trips.

name: Smils
text: We had a great time! Highly recommend

name: Cheryl H
text: These guys and gals did a great job. We had a blast!

name: Ashley Smith
text: Fantastic customer service and experience. We will definitely return on a future trip.

name: marc alexander
text: Great time, my kids LOVED it! Professional and courteous people.

name: Allen Scholl
text: It was definitely an experience worth trying at least one time.

name: Warren Harper
text: My wife and son (13) loved the parasailing, but not fond of the "adventure" to get to the boat. Had to ride a banana-boat pulled by a jet-ski to the parasailing boat. Our jet-ski driver was over-eager to say the least. He took off before my wife was on the banana-boat which forced her to get on it in higher water which was extrememly more difficult. Once on, he took off before she had a secure hold which slung her into the middle of the "water carriage" and onto the legs of other passengers. Thus, 5 for the parasailing; 1 for the banana-boat.

name: Lance Smith
text: My wife and I loved our trip up in the sky. Beautiful sites all around. The captain was a great guy to talk to (forgot his name, originally from Maine, worked in the Virgin Islands at one point.)

name: Michelle Bennett
text: Parasailing with Ike's was the best vacation activity!!  The staff was best in class at service and making you feel comfortable.  I was the adventurous mom who took her 2 boys flying.  It will be one of my favorite memories from our trip.  The boat staff was AMAZING and very professional.

name: janet spare
text: Ike’s parasailing is the best in gulf shores. The staff are helpful and friendly and are an example on how to deliver great customer service. We had people of various ages 12-50 participating and they all had a great time and felt safe doing so. Great day!

name: Kerry Story
text: This was a great crew and a hell of a experience would recommend to everyone .

name: Amber McKathan
text: Great experience and the captain/crew were great!

name: Jeff Mathews
text: Everyone was friendly and knew what they were doing. The pictures did not turn out as well as we had hoped, but we got a few good ones. Thanks for the fun adventure!

name: SARAH RICHARDS
text: Awesome trip! The two men that helped us were patient and understanding. We had a blast. Hardest part is getting on the banana boat. 😎

name: Todd Thurston
text: Took my daughter for her first trip up. SHE LOVED IT. We had captain jotty and he was wonderful.  We were a few minutes late to get started but our flight times were not shortened to "catch up." The staff were all professional and polite. Capt. Jotty was awesome. Good pictures. They are a few dollars more than their competitors but would easily recommend to a friend. Book early as they fill up the day pretty quickly.

name: Richard Wiginton
text: This place was amazing! They are in the process of renovating their office, but they were extremely helpful on the phone in getting us to the right location.  Once there, we only waited about 10 minutes until we were seated on the banana boat and headed out to the boat. The crew was amazing and very personable. They obviously know what they're doing, but still take the time to talk with the participants. I had a fear my motion sickness would kick in once in the air, but I felt nothing.  However, I might suggest taking motion sickness medicine anyway due to waves you experience when sitting idle in between rides. Overall, we loved this experience and would use Ike's again in a heartbeat.

name: Clare Anderson
text: The staff was so friendly and were very good at their job! I never once felt unsafe or nervous. I will definitely go back if we are in the area again and wanting to parasail!

name: Jeffrey Keel
text: Thanks Jason and Sawyer. Great trip.

name: Marc Weindel
text: The staff was amazing! Mike (the boat driver) was fun and accommodating! I would highly suggest this place for an enjoyable and fun experience for the whole family!

name: jared thacker
text: The team was courteous and helpful. It made a great experience all around. I would do it again next time.

name: Kayla Hauser
text: Super easy to book the trip and the whole experience was well done.  Very friendly and knowledgeable staff.  Such a smooth activity, an amazing experience.

name: Jade Wilson
text: Great crew, boat captain excellent, banana boat captain was great.

name: Ryan fister
text: It was me and my 8 year old daughters first time parasailing and I’m so glad we found Ike’s. Everyone was so nice and safety was obviously everyone’s number one concern. Highly recommended!!!

name: Levi Underwood
text: They really treated me well. I showed up a little late compared to when I was asked to arrive but they kept my spot for me. I even got a little sick on the boat and was nourished well. Plus I was even by myself and they accommodated me well in that scenario.

name: Steve Rogers
text: All around great experience. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The parasailing was really fun. Can’t wait to do it again.

name: Julie Hasty
text: Great experience and very helpful/friendly staff!!! Warning: if you go out from Gulf Shores you will board a banana boat to get to parasail boat! It’s hard to get on and hang on to but it sure is fun!

name: Jennifer Klenke
text: Love Ike's. We did banana boating, parasailing and rented lounges from them. Friendly and helpful!

name: Courtney Bernado
text: First time parasailing for myself and my husband. Great experience. Staff was very professional. The guys on the boat were thorough and professional. I would recommend you taking some motional sickness pills if you tend to get nauseous on a boat! Overall we LOVED it and would go again! Highly recommend Ike's in Gulf Shores.

name: Chad Butler
text: Super day with Ike’s Parasailing!  We went with our 11 yo son and daughter. They took great care of us from the shore to sailing! Great attention to detail—safe, beautiful ride.  Highly recommend!

name: Melina Keithly
text: Very professional crew! It was a gentle and smooth ride. Instructions were clear and safety was obviously a priority.

name: Aimee
text: This was our first time parasailing!  It was awesome!! The staff at Ike’s were knowledgeable and very accommodating.  They made sure everyone had a blast!   We made a reservation online and we went right at our scheduled time.  I highly recommend Ike’s!!!

name: Brian Honaker
text: Very friendly, professional and knowledgeable of what they are doing. This was my first time and they made sure I had a great experience.... so much fun.

name: Ronald Gramling
text:
Outstanding staff from signup to boat to shore!  What an experience for some first-timers from TX. Went with my daughter and her friend and they were nervous as nervous could be. The demeanor of our boat crew made us all comfortable. Nice.  Helpful.
Genuine. Honestly I dont think the 15% tip was enough and wish there was a close out process after the experience so I could have increased it. When they ask if you want the picture package, just do it, totally worth it. So many great photos for us to share!  Good people.  Great experience.

name: andrew newby
text: Great operation and a great time!

name: Teresa Kidder
text: Absolutely Amazing.

name: Stevie Sims
text: The owner was extremely helpful, courteous and understanding! I would definitely recommend them to anyone in the area!!

name: Scott Lambert
text:
Best and Safest Parasailing on the island.
The crew is extremely Pleasant and knowledgeable.
Everyone we talked to said this was by far their best experience parasailing.
We cant wait to go again next year.
Get the photo package, you will be glad you did.

name: Maegen Nicole
text: Such an amazing experience. Get the pictures it's worth it.

name: Beth Cason
text: This was my first time parasailing and it was an awesome experience.  Everyone with Ikes services was wonderful.  I would definitely use them again.  VERY friendly and helpful!!!!  Thanks for a wonderful experience!!!

name: Seth DeVries
text: The whole crew is great. The only thing I would suggest is take some motion sickness pills before you go.

name: Susie Kryzsko
text: Awesome experience!

name: Therron Henderson
text: ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL AMD SOO MUCH FUN!!! DEFINITELY WILL VE RETURNING AGAIN SOON!!!

name: Bryan Hagen
text: We can't wait to go again next year!

name: sherry stephens
text: Wonderful experience the Crew were awesome!!

name: Shannon Marlar
text: Amazing trip!! Capt Chip and mate will were amazing! We saw some dolphin and black tip sharks. All around great experience. Very experienced and will make sure you have the best trip❤️

name: shawash32
text: My son and I had an amazing time. My first time parasailing..it was a breeze..get the photo package added to your sail, great addition..I would highly recommend this tour...great start to our vacation!! Thanks 😊

name: Sherry
text: If you want to parasail, this is the place to choose! The staff was friendly, the wait was minimal because they scheduled their appointments so efficiently, and we got on the boat at the dock instead of riding out behind a jet ski. So. much. fun!

name: Shannon Meyer
text: We were running late because of traffic and they were extremely kind about it. Everyone from checking in, the captain and the deckhand were all a lot of fun. If you want to parasail this is the place to go.

name: Notdanhuntsman
text: Brennan and Justin were just terrific!! Definitely go here if you want some some

name: paul pinckley
text: Very friendly, professional, and entertaining. I would definitely recommend this place over the other ones in the area that we have been too.

name: Sindaze 101
text:
We had a blast. Myself (46) my daughter and her friend (both 17) and my son (12).  The kids said they had a great time and would do it again. The crew (one named Josh and unfortunately I can’t recall the other one) were amazing and had really fun personalities. They kept us entertained while the others were taking their turns.
I feel this excursion was well worth the price and that the staff went above and beyond in ensuring we had a good time. Recommend.

name: George Gogol
text: My two teenage sons and Mom went up and and a blast!  Great customer service, we would definitely recommend!

name: curtis marshall
text: Karen, the captain, and deck hand.   Highly recommend!! Awesome time.!!!!

name: Jeffery Lusk
text: Had a great experience with these guys. Everybody from the lady that checked us in from the 2 guys on the boat (Chip and Josh I think) were super awesome and helpful. Will always use the guys when i come back

name: TX Made
text: This was an amazing experience for me and my family. Chip and Brennan where very professional and friendly. I would highly recommend these two. Great memories and experience for a lifetime. If your on the fence, go for it. Hope this helps.

name: Travis Trudgeon
text: I took my three kids; 19, 16 and 6 and they had a great time.  The crew (chip and josh) were great they made all three of the anxious kiddos feel at ease!  The pictures are worth it, I would highly recommend!!

name: Lisa Albright
text: Chip and Brennan were fantastic; funny and professional! We left on schedule and the kids had a great time. We highly recommend them

name: allison pineda
text: Tim and Josh were fantastic! Great trip for our entire family! They made everyone feel comfortable and at ease. We will be back!

name: Adam Steele
text: Something must have changed from the poor reviews listed below.  There is no banana boat to get out, as you step right onboard the actual parasailing boat at the dock.  Chip and Josh were friendly as well, as well as the staff at the desk and over the phone.  We were also texted a reminder before our appointment as we registered online.  Thank you for a great family experience!

name: Jonathan Hargrove
text: Great time for my 16 year old daughter and her friend. Highly recommended.

name: B. Kimbrough
text: A very fun experience that everyone should do once! The time of the trip total is about an hour but we went with another group so total we were only actually in the air for a maximum of 15 minutes. The people that were working our boat were nice and did a great job.

name: Joy Tribbey
text: We had the BEST time!  I urge you to purchase the picture package!  Our son was scared prior to going up- they caught his expressions PERFECTLY and I will treasure these pictures forever!  Thank you for such a great experience!

name: Kayla Spaulding
text: We had such a great time parasailing. Nothing about the experience was not 100%. We actually choose this company because when we called they have is the most information without having to try to drag information out of them which we had a harder time getting info from others. When we got there we were welcomed by such a friendly staff and they were absolutely great with our children as well.

name: M. Kathy Allen
text:
Dear Mr & Mrs Pleasure Island Parasailing,
My excursion wasn’t pleasant.
Mr/Caption Cody humiliated us by asking my sister and I our combined weight in front of a boat load of people “ literally“. Cody could have handled the  situation very differently, walking over to us and explaining the situation regarding wind ETC.
Would have been a different experience/story.
Cody did ask if I wanted to pair with a child I didn’t know. I declined, it’s a family vacation didn’t want picture of me and a non family member. Truth be told she most likely didn’t want to be pair with a  stranger either.
I excepted your apology, appreciate the $38.50 refund.
Wish you and your family Happiness and Prosperity.
God Bless!
Kindest Regards,
Mary Allen

name: Nikki Knox
text: Crew was very polite and funny. Made the experience great. Definitely come back and recommend to others!

name: Chad Witherspoon
text: Would recommend this group to anyone.  My wife and I went for the ride.  My daughter and her two friends had a blast parasailing!  Staff was fun and friendly!

name: Andrew Dillman
text: Very friendly staff and a great time for people of all ages!

name: Cristal Hickey
text: This place was great. We initially had an issue with the time of our parasail. The staff was quick to accommodate our needs and correct the situation. When on vacation, you want smiling friendly individuals which they all were who are willing to work with you. We were satisfied and recommend for a friend.

name: Mike Hastings
text: Great customer service.  Daniel at the Bahama Bob's location was polite, flexible and accommodating.  There was heavy fog at our reservation time and he quickly and easily rescheduled our flight For later in the day.  The flight was awesome, photos were great from the photo package.  I left my wallet and Daniel took the time to find my number via our reservation and call several times.  Fly with these guys they are awesome

name: Angiebeth Ortiz
text: I have anxiety, but still wanted to do this and they made the most to make me feel safe! I will definitely do this again! They're great.

name: Ashley Shupe
text:
First family beach vacation... We arrived in Gulf Shores for a softball World Series and had lots of extra time to be tourists. So we were. Across from our lodging was a parasail company! Awesome!!! From the first call to ask questions to the call to make the reservation, EVERY person I spoke to was friendly and helpful.
Arriving to our location at Bahama Bob's to sign in.... Guess what.... That sign in crew was amazing!  Now, we are really feeling the good vibes and the jitters are leaving. We load up on the banana boat, helped up in the boat and the captain and deck hand start speaking . The were full of laughs, jokes, care , concern and safety. Best experience of the trip and will definitely be returning to fly twice a year!!!

name: Alexis Benyik
text: These are the nicest people we have met. We are down here on vacation (about a nine hour drive) and today we had reservations for parasailing. Would you believe I woke up sick and have had an incerdibly....explosive...morning. Well, we made it to the place on time and rushed into the restroom at the tiki bar. Very clean restroom 10 out of 10 would use it again. Granted there was a wasp in there(im allergic) looks like it wasnt my time to die yet tho! I digress, we got all checked in and ready and my stomach said HAH NOT TODAY! They checked on us to make sure we were ok before we want out. I said no, and they offered for us to reschudle to tomorrow just to make sure we would all be fine. I CANNOT EXPLAIN HOW MUCH THIS MEANT. Thank you guys for being so kind! I recomend these guys 100%

name: Laveta Henrickson
text: We spent over 500 for our party of 6 to do this and the driver cody was not very friendly at all was rude he ask me and my sister what our weight was she didnt go because of this and when the owner was told we were only given 1 half of the I ride refunded will never go with this company again we come here each year and do this but we wont spend our money here ever again

name: Bradley Fields
text: First time up and we had a blast. No issues great drivers, and fun guys. They were chatting with us the whole time. Professional and equipment looked up kept.

name: Jeffrey Short
text: I was deciding which company to use for my families trip.  I called two companies and this was one of them.  While talking with an employee over the phone about the details she decided to bash the competition. She said read their review's and you will regret picking them.  She also said they are a new company and not very experienced.  I read the reviews and didn't see any bad ones.  I used the other company and we had a blast.  Not saying this is a bad company just thought it was low to bash the other company like that.

name: Zach Larson
text: Awesome experience! It was my daughter and my first time parasailing. The staff was very helpful and kept us entertained. We will definitely go back!!

name: Maria Schafer
text: Awesome experience and awesome crew! Def worth it to get the pic package, my sister and I went last week and had our minds blown..! Shayhound took great pics and was very helpful... the captain, Tigger, and I bonded over our love for the Steelers, most definitely recommend

name: Mohammed Islam
text: We're appalled at the difference compared to previous parasailing experiences elsewhere. They were running an hour behind schedule and we were left to stand in the surf in our life vests in the blazing sun for a half hour with no explanation. There was absolutely NO descriptive for safety instructions.  Our trip out to the parasailing boat was terrifying. We had 4 in our party plus two others ... the banana boat was so imbalanced that it folded in half and dumped two of us in the ocean.  They didn't give us the option of not being dunked .... which would have been nice since the jelly fish were a problem at that time.  The captain and his mate just played loud music and didn't socialize with anybody during the sail.  Two of us injured our feet (bent our big toenails back) getting on the banana boat to return to shore. Some of the pictures were great,  but there were far less than the 200 promised  .... maybe 5 unique pictures. We chose this company because their rating was higher than other providers ..... maybe we can keep that from happening to others.

name: LeeWood Goodlett
text: Went in June. First time parasailing and I absolutely loved it. The staff was great and made it fun. I'd definitely recommend them. Also got the pictures and was glad I did.

name: jodi mcleod
text: Was located right behind our condo. All the staff were very friendly and informative. This was our first parasailing adventure and everyone was great and patient to help with keeping us calm

name: Shane Blaski
text: Awesome guys! Had a blast

name: Max Perilstein
text: Excellent set up. Great time. Chip and Dustin were great. Super value. We had a blast. Will do it again when we return. Thank you.

name: Rebecca Miller
text: The lady who answered the phone was rude so I never even made reservations- if they are rude there probably rude service all around

name: Angie Phillips
text: Staff was great.  Very friendly, informative and knowledgeable.  Not long lines and little wait time to parasail.

name: TheBoatbroker
text: We were here on a 60 degree day, told the captain not to dip us, he did any way. The guy on the Waverunner driving the banana boat out said we might get a little wet because of the waves. Waves are one thing, and I get it. On the way out to the boat we got splashed a little. On the way in I was hit in the face with the full force of the 140hp jet blast, staff just shook their heads and said damnit Jake. This would have been acceptable if I was 22 and with my drunk frat brothers, BUT I had my 9 year old girl and 11 year old boy with me.  JACKASSES!!!

name: Cindy Phan
text: Omg! Best experience ever! Parasailing was worth every penny!

name: Lydia Franz
text: Had a great time, very professional and safe!! I would definitely recommend. Their location at the Pink Pony, Gulf Shores public beach was very convenient.

name: Frankie Casey
text: Come here for 3 kids to parasail... was very disappointed.  Captain on the boat and his co-captain wasn't real kid friendly.  We paid 273.00 for 3 to ride and some pics.  We were told the 2 oldest could ride together and then 1 of them could ride with the youngest.  Once they got on the boat they made all 3 ride together.  They got to stay up for approximately 6 mins.  The couple in front of them 4 minutes. We were told they were a 10 minute ride.  We also paid the extra 35.00 for what was suppose to be over a 100 pics on an SD card... which they received about 35 pics.  Overpriced for they service we got!!

name: Jamie Contreras
text: Fun place beautiful views

name: David Jourdenais
text: We've done this before,  but it wasn't scary.  This most certainly was a harrowing experience.  If the operators were friendly,  it would have helped immensely.  Some of us were thrown from the banana boat on our way out.  Enough said.

name: Aly Khemani
text: Our first time ever and these guys were great and guided us all the way.

name: Savannah Lavender
text: Cant say enough about this company very professional not run by kids very helpful an go out of there way to make u have fun Thanks Chip an Kerry for giving my Grandkids a great ride.

name: Jacob Meidel
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff made for a great experience parasailing. We bought the picture package (approx $30), definitely worth it.

name: Kelly Tilley
text: Love this company very safety conscious let my two grandkids go up who were 5 an 6 they loved it . they make u have fun kids had the biggest smile on there faces , Thanks so much Kerry an Chip you have a great crew .

name: rylie gandt
text: Captain Joe is the best he gives you great rides and does what you say, i recommend that you do this!!!

name: Patricia Swisher
text: Had my son and his friend take a parasail ride, a great experience for them! Thanks

name: Debra Garoutte
text: The captain of the boat Cody was not very friendly and the deck hand was not very friendly either was not a good experience at all I talked to the owner and He said  that Cody was talked to and if we ever come back he would take care of us but I will never fly with them again ☹

name: Corey Depottey
text: Love it! Would do it again!

name: Sam Brown
text: Fun

name: Michael Moix
text: Great customer service!
